content: of second chain from hook and each chain across chain 1 turn note this row is on top working in front loops single_crochet in next 3 single_crochet half_double_crochet in next single_crochet double_crochet in next 3 single_crochet chain 2 turn single_crochet in one loop of second chain from hook then in back loop of each st across chain 1 turn repeat last 2 row once do not chain 1 at end single_crochet in end of second to last row skip a row single_crochet in end of next row slip st to join to first single_crochet do not bind off single_crochet in top loop of each single_crochet on back end of foot and two exposed loops on top back end of foot in middle work in rounds from this point 4sts total single_crochet in next single_crochet 2 single_crochet in next single_crochet single_crochet in next 2 single_crochet 5sts total single_crochet in each single_crochet around for six rounds stuff leg flatten across opening and single_crochet across both thicknesses 3sts across fasten_off leaving a long tail for sewing to body sew legs along side/bottom of body wings worked flat with white chain 5 leaving long tail for sewing single_crochet in second chain from hook and each chain across ch1 turn single_crochet in each single_crochet across ch1 turn decrease single_crochet in next 2 single_crochet ch1 turn single_crochet in each single_crochet across ch1 turn decrease single_crochet in next single_crochet ch1 turn decrease fasten_off sew wings to side of body
